name: Flappy Bird Clone (Sahal)
description:
This Is A Clone Of Flappy Bird I Made Just For Fun Using The Exact Same Assets Of The Actual Game. This Is A 2D Game Made For Android.

This Game Is Open Source And You Can Do Whatever You Want Using The Source Code.

Source Code (Made In Unity) : https://github.com/SahalDev/FlappyBirdExactClonelol
Assets I Used For The Game : https://www.spriters-resource.com/mobile/flappybird/sheet/59894/
